main_intro.uz:
üöñ Viloyatdan Toshkentga yoki Toshkentdan viloyatga safar qilmoqchimisiz?

 üì≤ CarGo botida buyurtma bering!
main_intro.en:
üöñ Want to travel from region to Tashkent or from Tashkent to region?

 üì≤ Order a ride in CarGo bot!

how_it_works_msg.uz: üöÄ CarGo - Viloyatlararo taksi xizmati üöñCarGoFastBot sizning qulay va xavfsiz sayohatingiz uchun yaratilgan zamonaviy Telegram botidir. Afzalliklarimiz: üî∞Tez va oson buyurtma - Faqat bir necha tugmani bosib, yo'nalishingiz va manzilingizni kiriting, kerakli taksini darhol topasiz. ‚ö†Ô∏èXavfsizlik va Ishonchlilik - Botda taksi haydovchilari malakali va tajribali. ‚ùìQanday ishlaydi? 1Ô∏è‚É£ Telegramda CarGoFastBot ni oching. 2Ô∏è‚É£ ‚ÄúStart‚Äù tugmasini bosing. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Manzilingiz va borish joyingizni kiriting. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Haydovchilarimiz tez orada siz bilan bog'lanishadi. üöÄ CarGo - sayohat qilishning yangi usuli!
how_it_works_msg.en: üöÄ CarGo - Intercity taxi service üöñ CarGoFastBot is designed for your safe and convenient travel. Advantages: üî∞Fast and easy booking - just a few taps. ‚ö†Ô∏èSafety and reliability - professional drivers only. ‚ùìHow it works? 1Ô∏è‚É£ Open CarGoFastBot in Telegram. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Press the ‚ÄúStart‚Äù button. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Enter your route and destination. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Drivers will contact you shortly. üöÄ CarGo - the new way to travel!

invalid_command.uz: ‚ùå Noma'lum buyruq! Siz bot chatiga bevosita xabar yubordingiz yoki bot sozlamalari o‚Äòzgartirilgan bo‚Äòlishi mumkin. ‚ÑπÔ∏è Iltimos, botga to'g'ridan-to'g'ri yozmang. Botdan foydalanish uchun /start tugmasini bosib menyuni yangilang.
invalid_command.en: ‚ùå Unknown command! You wrote directly to the bot chat or the bot settings may have been changed. ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please do not write directly to the bot. To use the bot, press /start to refresh the menu.

terms_and_conditions_msg.uz: ‚ñ† HAYDOVCHI BILAN SHARTNOMA Ushbu shartnoma ‚ÄúCarGo‚Äù platformasi (keyingi o'rinlarda ‚ÄúPlatforma‚Äù) va haydovchi (keyingi o'rinlarda ‚ÄúHaydovchi‚Äù) o'rtasida tuziladi. Shartnomaning asosiy maqsadi - yo'lovchilarga xavfsiz, qulay va sifatli transport xizmatini ta'minlashdir. 1. UMUMIY QOIDALAR 1.1. Platforma - yo'lovchi va haydovchi o'rtasida vositachi bo'lib xizmat qiladi. 1.2. Haydovchi o'z faoliyati uchun to'liq javobgar bo'ladi. 1.3. Yo'lovchi doim haqli - haydovchi esa mijozga hurmat bilan xizmat ko'rsatishi shart. 2. TO'LOVLAR VA QOIDALAR 2.1. Platformadan foydalanish mutlaqo bepul hisoblanadi. 2.2. Platforma vaqtincha haydovchidan hech qanday to'lov yoki xizmat haqi talab qilmaydi. 2.3. Haydovchi faqat o'z hisobidan xizmat qiladi va olingan buyurtmalar uchun mustaqil javobgar bo'ladi. 3. HAYDOVCHI MAJBURIYATLARI 3.1. Yo'lovchi bilan doimo xushmuomala bo'lish. 3.2. Transport vositasi toza, ozoda va texnik jihatdan soz bo'lishi. 3.3. Xizmat jarayonida barcha yo'l harakati qoidalariga rioya qilish. 3.4. Yo'lovchini xavfsiz va belgilangan manzilga yetkazib qo'yish. 3.5. Platforma tomonidan belgilangan barcha qoidalarga rioya qilish. 4. PLATFORMANING HUQUQLARI 4.1. Haydovchi qoidabuzarlik qilgan taqdirda, uni platformadan chetlatish huquqiga ega. 4.2. Yo'lovchilardan tushgan shikoyatlar tekshiriladi va zarur chora ko'riladi. 4.3. Platforma haydovchining shaxsiy xatti-harakatlari uchun javobgar emas. 5. YAKUNIY QOIDALAR 5.1. Ushbu shartnoma muddatsiz tuzilgan bo'lib, tomonlardan biri uni bekor qilishni xohlasa, oldindan ogohlantirishi shart. 5.2. Har qanday nizolar O'zbekiston Respublikasining amaldagi qonunlariga muvofiq hal etiladi.
terms_and_conditions_msg.en: ‚ñ† DRIVER AGREEMENT This agreement is made between the ‚ÄúCarGo‚Äù platform (hereinafter referred to as the ‚ÄúPlatform‚Äù) and the driver (hereinafter referred to as the ‚ÄúDriver‚Äù). The main purpose of this agreement is to provide passengers with safe, comfortable, and high-quality transportation services. 1. GENERAL RULES 1.1. The Platform acts as an intermediary between passengers and drivers. 1.2. The Driver is fully responsible for their own activities. 1.3. The Passenger is always right ‚Äì the Driver must treat customers with respect. 2. PAYMENTS AND RULES 2.1. Use of the Platform is completely free. 2.2. Currently, the Platform does not charge any fees or commissions from the Driver. 2.3. The Driver operates at their own expense and is solely responsible for all accepted ride requests. 3. DRIVER OBLIGATIONS 3.1. Always be polite to passengers. 3.2. The vehicle must be clean, well-maintained, and technically sound. 3.3. Comply with all traffic regulations. 3.4. Ensure safe and timely transportation of the passenger to the specified destination. 3.5. Follow all rules established by the Platform. 4. PLATFORM RIGHTS 4.1. The Platform has the right to suspend or remove a Driver who violates the rules. 4.2. Complaints from passengers will be reviewed and necessary measures taken. 4.3. The Platform is not responsible for the personal conduct of Drivers. 5. FINAL PROVISIONS 5.1. This agreement is indefinite; either party may terminate it with prior notice. 5.2. Any disputes shall be resolved in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
